official-title.#text:
To amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit
		  Control Act of 1985 to exempt the National Institutes of Health from
		  sequestration under section 251A for fiscal year 2013, and to reduce the
		  sequestration by the amount of the exemption.
